name: Caterpie
flavorText: When attacked by bird Pokémon, it resists by releasing a terrifically strong odor from its antennae, but it often becomes their prey.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Alolan Exeggutor
flavorText: As it grew taller and taller, it outgrew its reliance on psychic powers, while within it awakened the power of the sleeping dragon.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 more damage for each type of basic Energy card in your discard pile. You can't add more than 100 damage in this way.

name: Magmar
flavorText: When angered, it spouts brilliant fire from all over its body. It doesn't calm down until its opponent has burned to ash.
Attack1Text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Alolan Sandshrew
flavorText: An ancient tradition of Alolan festivals, still carried on to this day, is a competition to slide Sandshrew across ice as far as one can.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.

name: Lapras
flavorText: These Pokémon were once near extinction due to poaching. Following protective regulations, there is now an overabundance of them.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

name: Pikachu
flavorText: A plan was recently announced to gather many Pikachu and make an electric power plant.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

name: Gastly
flavorText: Should a strange light be seen flickering in an abandoned building, Gastly is lurking there.
Attack1Text: Put 1 damage counter on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Mankey
flavorText: It can spontaneously become enraged. Everyone near it clears out as it rampages, and the resulting loneliness makes it angrier still.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.

name: Onix
flavorText: It usually lives underground. It searches for food while boring its way through the ground at 50 miles per hour.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, the Defending Pokémon takes 20 more damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

name: Alolan Meowth
flavorText: When its delicate pride is wounded, or when the gold coin on its forehead is dirtied, it flies into a hysterical rage.
Attack1Text: If you go second, this attack does 60 more damage during your first turn.

name: Alolan Dugtrio
flavorText: This Pokémon are cherished in the Alola region, where they are thought to be feminine deities of the land incarnate.
Attack1Text: Discard any number of Metal Energy cards from your hand. This attack does 30 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

name: Eevee
evolvesTo: Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon, Sylveon, Espeon, Umbreon, Leafeon, Glaceon
flavorText: Current studies show it can evolve into an incredible eight different species of Pokémon.
